name: Don't burn
description:
The city is engulfed in flames. YOU - a brave rescuer who will stop at nothing to stop a fire and save the inhabitants of the city.
Don't burn is a colorful pixel "arkanoid" in which you need to either put out the entire fire on the level or save all the inhabitants. Do not let the fire spread too much, collect bonuses and save points.

Features:
- Pixel graphics
- 20 colorful levels
- Fun gameplay
- Management from the keyboard and gamepad
